00044 struct CbFileHeader {
00045                 int magic;  //set it as 0x061561, check consistence.                    
00046                 size_t maxKeys; //a node at mostly hold maxKeys items. 
00047                 size_t pageSize;        
00048                 size_t cacheSize;       
00049                 size_t numItems;                
00050                 long rootPos;           
00051 
00052                 static size_t nPages; 
00053                 static size_t oPages;
00054                 
00055                 CbFileHeader()
00056                 {
00057                         magic = 0x061561;
00058                         maxKeys = 24;
00059                         pageSize = 1024;        
00060                         cacheSize = 1000000;                    
00061                         numItems = 0;
00062                         rootPos = sizeof(CbFileHeader)+sizeof(size_t);
00063                         
00064                         CbFileHeader::nPages = 0;       
00065                         CbFileHeader::oPages = 0;
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 void display(std::ostream& os = std::cout) {
00069                         os<<"magic: "<<magic<<endl;     
00070                         os<<"maxKeys: "<<maxKeys<<endl;
00071                         os<<"pageSize: "<<pageSize<<endl;                       
00072                         os<<"cacheSize: "<<cacheSize<<endl;
00073                         os<<"numItem: "<<numItems<<endl;                                
00074                         os<<"rootPos: "<<rootPos<<endl;
00075                         
00076                         os<<"node Pages: "<<nPages<<endl;
00077                         os<<"overflow Pages: "<<oPages<<endl;   
00078                         os<<endl;
00079                         os<<"file size: "<<pageSize*(nPages+oPages)+sizeof(CbFileHeader)+2*sizeof(size_t)<<"bytes"<<endl;
00080                         if(nPages != 0)
00081                         {
00082                                 os<<"average items number in a btree ndoe: "<<double(numItems)/double(nPages)<<endl;
00083                                 os<<"average overflow page for a node: "<<double(oPages)/double(nPages)<<endl;
00084                         }
00085                         
00086                 }
00087 
00088                 bool toFile(FILE* f)
00089                 {
00090                         if ( 0 != fseek(f, 0, SEEK_SET) )
00091                                 return false;
00092                         fwrite(this, sizeof(CbFileHeader), 1, f);               
00093                         fwrite(&nPages, sizeof(size_t), 1, f);  
00094                         fwrite(&oPages, sizeof(size_t), 1, f);  
00095                         return true;
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 bool fromFile(FILE* f)
00099                 {
00100                         if ( 0 != fseek(f, 0, SEEK_SET) )
00101                                 return false;
00102                         fread(this, sizeof(CbFileHeader), 1, f);
00103                         fread(&nPages, sizeof(size_t), 1, f);
00104                         fread(&oPages, sizeof(size_t), 1, f);
00105                         return true;
00106                 }
00107         };
